content.prompt: The expansion of the transatlantic slave trade in the 1700s is best explained by which of the following developments?

choices.label: Great Britainâ€™s increasing dominance of the world trading economy
Growth in European demand for New World agricultural products
Growing shortages of labor in Europe
Decrease in the cost of labor in Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
